> Compile ES2015 sticky regex to an ES5 RegExp constructor

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-sticky-regex
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-sticky-regex --dev
```
